column4: I'm new to VirtualBox... I've got a vm created, base memory 384 mb, ubuntu studio .iso mounted as the CD. I boot the vm and try to install, but it goes black except for an underscore in the top left corner. Conky shows my processor is maxed; is it just having trouble running, or did I do something wrong?
try increasing the amount of ram you gave to the vmachine
Up to 450 mb, and still no effect; the installer says it only needs 32 mb ram...
